heroSection.title: About JNV Sirohi Alumni Portal
heroSection.subtitle: Connecting Alumni, Building Networks, Creating Opportunities
heroSection.description: A dedicated platform for Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Sirohi alumni to reconnect, share achievements, and foster lifelong bonds with their alma mater.

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description: The JNV Sirohi Alumni Portal is designed to bridge the gap between the school and its alumni community. It aims to create a vibrant ecosystem where former students can reconnect, share experiences, and contribute to the growth of current students.

features.title: Alumni Directory
features.description: Find and connect with fellow JNV Sirohi alumni

features.title: Interactive Dashboard
features.description: Personalized dashboard with news, events, and networking opportunities

features.title: Real-time Communication
features.description: Chat system and notifications to keep the community connected

features.title: Career Opportunities
features.description: Job postings and mentorship programs for career advancement

features.title: Success Stories
features.description: Platform to share achievements and inspire fellow alumni

aboutInstitution.title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Sirohi
aboutInstitution.description: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Sirohi is a co-educational residential school affiliated to CBSE, established in 1986 under the Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti, Ministry of Education, Government of India. The school is dedicated to providing quality education to talented children predominantly from rural areas of Sirohi district.
aboutInstitution.history: JNV Sirohi was established in 1986 as part of the nationwide Navodaya Vidyalaya initiative. The school has grown to become a center of academic excellence, nurturing students from diverse backgrounds and preparing them for leadership roles in society.
aboutInstitution.vision: To nurture and empower rural talent through quality education, holistic development, and value-based learning.
aboutInstitution.mission: To provide a supportive and inclusive environment that encourages academic excellence, leadership, and social responsibility among students.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Striving for the highest standards in academics and personal growth

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Upholding honesty and strong moral principles

values.title: Respect
values.description: Fostering mutual respect among students, staff, and the community

values.title: Service
values.description: Contributing positively to society and nation-building

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Embracing diversity and providing equal opportunities

achievements: Consistently high performance in CBSE Class X & XII board exams
State and national level achievements in sports, science, and cultural competitions
Well-equipped science, computer, and mathematics laboratories
Focus on holistic development including arts, sports, and leadership activities

aboutDevelopers.title: Meet the Development Team
aboutDevelopers.description: This alumni portal is crafted with passion and dedication by a team of talented developers who believe in the power of technology to connect people and create meaningful experiences.

team.name: Bhupendra Chouhan
team.description: Man behind the project, specializing in full-stack development, UI/UX design, and the creation of innovative web applications which we are using here.
team.quote: One man army behind this project.

team.name: Kuldeep Chouhan
team.description: UI/UX design, database management, and API integration, ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.
team.quote: Ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.

developmentProcess.description: Comprehensive requirement analysis and UI/UX design
Building responsive and interactive user interfaces
Creating robust APIs and database architecture
Connecting all components and thorough testing

testimonials.name: Dr. S.K. Sharma
testimonials.message: The alumni portal has greatly enhanced our ability to stay connected with our former students and celebrate their achievements.

testimonials.name: Priya Singh
testimonials.message: This platform has made alumni engagement seamless and effective. We've seen a significant increase in alumni participation since its launch.

testimonials.name: Amit Joshi
testimonials.message: A wonderful initiative that keeps me connected with my alma mater and fellow alumni. The user experience is exceptional!

contactInfo.title: Get in Touch
contactInfo.description: Have questions about the portal or want to contribute? We'd love to hear from you!
contactInfo.address: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Kalandri, Sirohi, Rajasthan, India - 307001
